cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.view.content.connection

Class FxNodeLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
              • cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.view.content.connection.FxNodeLink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BezierFxNodeLink, LineFxNodeLink

    public abstract class FxNodeLink
extends javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
    Graphical (visible) link between two nodes FxModelNode.
